body:
Hello avicus community, my name is TinyFighter or you can refer to me as Aiman as it is my real name.

I'd thought since I'm new to the forums and going to be playing a lot, why not introduce myself!

So lets get started, I'm a 13 year old gamer who will be turning 14 in December 18th. I love to play sports and video games.

I also like to code and script. In a game called roblox(not putting a link = advertising) I script many sorts of games and it gets published pretty often.

I can sometimes tend' to be hot headed when I'm losing none the less I'm a very friend and competitive player of Minecraft. 

I love to laugh when someone does a mistake! xD... Pretty weird but yea..

Thats all I guess those are the basic things about my gaming stats.. So, if you have anything personal to ask me PM. CYA

title: TinyFigter Reporting to duty!

Hope you enjoy yourself on the forums and server :)
I'll see you on the battlefield >:)
Also First! Hue
